stateMachineName.description: The name of the state-machine which conjured the currently rendered board

title.description: The title identifying this board-instance - would be available on any rendered board

description.description: Some summary content - most likely available on the rendered board or search result etc. Could even be user-editable to help better recognise the reason the board was watched in the first place.

key.description: A key/value pair object describing the primary key of the currently displayed board - perhaps derived from the launches object which caused the board to be rendered.
